item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

This is the boolean wot ive got

public boolean cannonowner() { if(playerName == cannonowner){ return true; } else { return false; } }

Anything wrong with that? Because when ever i try and fire my cannon at monsters it says you can’t fire someone elses cannon or summet…

Read full topic
